description:
NTS Map: 082O01 
Really nice route, nice views, very challenging (full exercise).
90% or more of the time are trails.(NO RISKS)
directions: It starts at Wentworth (85 St./11 Ave. SW), all the way down to town going through Edworthy Park and Princes Island Park finishing back at Wentworth SW.
title: Bow River East Ride (Route to Town)
